title: Tesla GPU does not work on tf 1.13.1 / CUDA 10
body:
Get this when trying base settings. Just downloaded the Windows App, latest ver.

 Model options:
|== batch_size : 4
|== sort_by_yaw : False
|== random_flip : True
|== resolution : 128
|== face_type : f
|== learn_mask : True
|== archi : df
|== ae_dims : 512
|== ed_ch_dims : 42
|== lighter_encoder : False
|== multiscale_decoder : True
|== pixel_loss : False
|== face_style_power : 0.0
|== bg_style_power : 0.0
Running on:
|== [0 : Tesla V100-SXM2-32GB]
